Posts.Content: Has anyone had experience or knowledge of taking milk thistle when having breast cancer?  Read somewhere that it shouldn't be taken if you have breast cancer which is totally contrary to what I understood before.  Would love to hear other people's thoughts.
Posts.Title: Complementary medicine - milk thistle

Posts.Content: Thank you everyone for your replies which were very helpful. Not going to take the milk thistle but carry on with treatments such as reflexology and when the radiotherapy finished will try manual lymph drainage.  Having massage type treatments are just so soothing and relaxing.
Posts.Title: Complementary medicine - milk thistle
